segments.text: Um , what will you do this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about a movie ? We haven't done that for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A movie ? Sure . Do you know what's on right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Why don't you check out the newspaper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Maybe you should invite your sister along , too .
segments.speaker: S1
